# The `Impl` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl">Impl</a> is where Bifield description and Storage are put together to interact with values. <a href="#details">More...</a>
